issue.errorLine1: static synchronized void load(final Context context) {

issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 21; however, the containing class com.example.android.support.text.emoji.ConfigLayout is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
EmojiCompat.reset can only be called from within the same library (androidx.emoji2:emoji2)
